item.title: 预测市场认为特朗普关税案将在最高法院一锤定音
item.description: 特朗普关税案将在最高法院摊牌，赌徒们认为胜负难料【原文：Trump's tariffs are heading for a Supreme Court showdown and bettors see a close call】

item.title: Adobe 首席执行官称股价被低估，市场聚焦芯片
item.description: Adobe Inc.首席执行官尚塔努-纳拉延（Shantanu Narayen）表示，由于华尔街关注芯片和人工智能培训基础设施，他的公司被低估了。【原文：Adobe Inc. Chief Executive Officer Shantanu Narayen said his company is being undervalued as Wall Street focuses on chips and AI training infrastructure.】

item.title: 欧洲太阳能发电激增给电网带来前所未有的压力
item.description: 可再生能源的兴起导致了数以千计的电压超标事件。【原文：The rise of renewables had led to thousands of instances of voltage exceeding allowed limits.】

item.title: 爱尔兰经济近两年来首次出现萎缩
item.description: 在截至 9 月份的三个月中，爱尔兰经济出现萎缩，美国总统唐纳德-特朗普的贸易炮火在这一季度占据了主导地位。【原文：Ireland’s economy contracted in the three months through September, a quarter that was dominated by US President Donald Trump’s trade salvos.】

item.title: PayPal 宣布与 OpenAI 达成交易后上调盈利预期
item.description: 贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.）上调了全年盈利指导，并宣布与 OpenAI 合作，将其数字钱包嵌入 ChatGPT，从而使其股价在纽约早盘交易中飙升。【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. raised its full-year earnings guidance and announced a tie-up with OpenAI to embed its digital wallet into ChatGPT, sending its shares soaring in early New York trading.】

item.title: 亚马逊人工智能云业务增长放缓可能并非致命缺陷
item.description: 欢迎阅读 Tech In Depth，这是彭博社全球记者关于科技商业的每日时事通讯。今天，马特-戴评估了亚马逊在不断变化的云计算市场中的地位。【原文：Welcome to Tech In Depth, our daily newsletter about the business of tech from Bloomberg’s journalists around the world. Today, Matt Day sizes up Amazon’s place in the changing cloud computing market.】

item.title: 加密货币行业在中期选举前积累 2.63 亿美元战利品
item.description: 刚刚在 2024 年大选中取得成功，加密货币行业又在 2026 年中期选举前提高了消费能力。【原文：Fresh off its success in the 2024 elections, the crypto industry is amping up its spending power ahead of the 2026 midterms.】

item.title: 2026 年值得关注的 24 家初创企业（OpenAI 除外
item.description:
有二十多家公司通过制作振动编码软件、制造机器人和开发无人机，在人工智能领域找到了自己的方向。【原文：

Two dozen companies are finding their way in AI by making vibe-coding software, building robots and developing drones.

】

item.title: 曾警告中美贸易战 "一团糟 "的中国专家看到了新的升级风险
item.description: 斯科特-肯尼迪（Scott Kennedy）警告说，两国之间正在出现的休战可能基础不稳。【原文：Scott Kennedy cautions that the emerging truce between the two nations may rest on a shaky foundation.】

item.title: 高盛和贝莱德签约试用 Circle 的 Arc 区块链
item.description: 稳定币发行商Circle Internet Group Inc.推出了Arc区块链测试版，包括高盛集团（Goldman Sachs Group Inc）、贝莱德（BlackRock）、阿波罗全球管理公司（Apollo Global Management Inc）、Anthropic PBC和洲际交易所（Intercontinental Exchange Inc）在内的多家公司签约试用该技术。【原文：Stablecoin issuer Circle Internet Group Inc. has launched the test version of its Arc blockchain, with companies including Goldman Sachs Group Inc, BlackRock, Apollo Global Management Inc, Anthropic PBC and Intercontinental Exchange Inc signing up to trial the technology.】

item.title: 贝宝与 OpenAI 的 ChatGPT 达成数字钱包协议
item.description: 贝宝控股公司（PayPal Holdings Inc.【原文：PayPal Holdings Inc. shares soared after it reached a deal with OpenAI to embed its digital wallet inside the firm’s ChatGPT product.】

item.title: 花旗银行期待人工智能帮助老板撰写绩效考核报告
item.description: 花旗集团首席执行官简-弗雷泽（Jane Fraser）一直在寻找提高整个公司效率的方法，因此花旗集团正在迅速扩大员工使用人工智能的方式。【原文：Citigroup Inc. is rapidly expanding the ways staffers can use artificial intelligence as Chief Executive Officer Jane Fraser continues to hunt for ways to improve efficiency across the firm.】

item.title: Tether 考虑与大型加密货币 PAC 分离，用于政治捐赠
item.description: 稳定币巨头 Tether 正在考虑为美国大选花钱，因为它准备在美国开设实体公司，并且正在考虑除赢得美国大型加密货币公司支持的政治行动委员会之外的其他选择。【原文：Stablecoin giant Tether is looking at spending money on US elections as it prepares to open a US entity and is considering options other than the political action committee that has won the support of big US crypto companies.】

item.title: 亮相很重要华尔街巨头在沙特阿拉伯大肆宣传
item.description: 在沙特阿拉伯年度金融会议开始之前，华尔街的巨头们就已经发出了他们的意向信号。花旗集团公布了其在利雅得的新地区总部，而巴克莱银行则表示将在退出沙特十年后重返沙特。【原文：Even before Saudi Arabia’s annual finance conference began, Wall Street’s biggest names were already signaling their intent. Citigroup Inc. unveiled its new regional headquarters in Riyadh, while Barclays Plc said it would return to the kingdom a decade after its exit.】

item.title: 看涨者称，势头似乎将推动 S&P 500 指数突破 7,000 点
item.description:
资金流数据显示，散户和专业投资者正在涌入市场。【原文：

Fund flow data shows retail and professional investors are pouring into the market. 

】

item.title: 英伟达投资者期待DC "超级碗 "为低迷股价注入活力
item.description: 在引领股市多年之后，英伟达公司（Nvidia Corp.现在，华尔街正在寻找一些 "DC 魔法 "来让股价再次上涨。【原文：After years of leading the stock market, Nvidia Corp.’s wild rally took a break over the summer. Now Wall Street is looking for some DC magic to get the shares running again.】

item.title: 欧洲央行行长拉加德表示食品通胀必须继续下降
item.description: 欧洲中央银行行长克里斯蒂娜-拉加德（Christine Lagarde）表示，官员们必须确保食品通胀缓解。【原文：European Central Bank President Christine Lagarde said officials must ensure food inflation eases.】

item.title: 亚马逊将裁员 1.4 万人
item.description: 亚马逊公司（Amazon.com Inc.【原文：Amazon.com Inc. said it was cutting about 14,000 jobs in a major restructuring.】

item.title: 美国为推动人工智能签署 800 亿美元核反应堆协议
item.description: 美国政府与西屋电气公司就建造核反应堆达成了一项价值 800 亿美元的协议，这是美国政府为满足人工智能带来的不断增长的电力需求而采取的最新举措。【原文：The US government agreed a $80 billion deal with Westinghouse Electric Co. to build nuclear reactors, the latest push to meet rising demand for electricity from artificial intelligence.】

item.title: 股票多头认为随着势头增强，S&P 500 指数将升至 7,000 点以上
item.description: 现在看来，季节性的波动已经过去，股市多头们正排队打赌 S&P 500 指数将飙升至 7000 点以上。【原文：Equity bulls are lining up to wager the S&P 500 will surge past 7,000 now that it looks as if a seasonal bout of volatility has passed.】

item.title: 据说优步计划投资 Pony AI 和 WeRide 的香港上市公司
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，优步科技公司正计划投资在香港上市的 Pony AI 公司和 WeRide 公司，从而加深这家打车巨头与中国机器人出租车公司的联系。【原文：Uber Technologies Inc. is planning to invest in the Hong Kong listings of Pony AI Inc. and WeRide Inc., according to people familiar with the matter, deepening the ride-hailing giant’s ties with the Chinese robotaxi firms.】

item.title: 据说马云支持的宝龙人寿将秘密申请在香港上市
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国干细胞药物制造商波隆生命公司已秘密申请在香港首次公开募股，可能募集约3亿美元或更多资金。【原文：Pollon Life, a Chinese maker of stem cell drugs, has filed confidentially for a Hong Kong initial public offering that could raise about $300 million or more, according to people familiar with the matter.】

item.title: 特朗普在东京晚宴上与苹果公司和 Salesforce 首席执行官共进晚餐
item.description: 美国总统唐纳德-特朗普与包括 Salesforce 公司的马克-贝尼奥夫（Marc Benioff）、苹果公司的蒂姆-库克（Tim Cook）和乐天集团的三木谷浩史（Hiroshi Mikitani）在内的商界领袖共进晚餐，希望借此宣传日本在美国的投资。【原文：US President Donald Trump dined with business leaders including Salesforce Inc.’s Marc Benioff, Apple Inc.’s Tim Cook, and Rakuten Group Inc.’s Hiroshi Mikitani as he looks to tout Japanese investment in the US.】

item.title: 中国银行利润增长 5%，利润率趋于稳定
item.description: 中国银行公布第三季度利润增长 5%，尽管信贷需求疲软带来越来越多的挑战，但该银行仍设法稳定了净息差。【原文：Bank of China Ltd. reported a 5% increase in third-quarter profit, as the lender managed to stabilize its net interest margin despite mounting challenges from weakening credit demand.】

item.title: 欧洲央行称消费者对通胀的预期基本不变
item.description: 欧元区消费者的通胀预期在 9 月份变化不大，支持了欧洲中央银行维持利率不变的计划。【原文：Inflation expectations among euro-area consumers were little changed in September, supporting the European Central Bank’s plan to keep interest rates on hold.】

item.title: 科技公司竞相遏制智利的人工智能监管计划
item.description: 智利政府试图对人工智能的使用施加道德约束，却招致全球科技巨头的反击，这场争论可能会成为先例，因为世界各国都在考虑如何监管这个快速发展的行业。【原文：A government attempt to impose ethical guardrails on the use of artificial intelligence in Chile is drawing pushback from global technology giants, a debate that could set precedents as nations around the world reckon with how to regulate the rapidly growing industry.】

item.title: 流氓交易员 "尼克-利森受聘于风险技术公司 HedgX
item.description: 曾搞垮霸菱银行的前衍生品交易员尼克-利森（Nick Leeson）已加入风险技术公司 HedgX 担任顾问。【原文：Nick Leeson, the former derivatives trader who brought down Barings Bank, has joined risk technology company HedgX as an advisor.】

item.title: 市场反弹提升投资回报，中国平安利润上升
item.description: 中国平安保险（集团）股份有限公司表示，今年前九个月的利润增长了11.5%，原因是股市上涨提高了投资回报，保单销售也有所扩大。【原文：Ping An Insurance (Group) Co. said profit rose 11.5% in the first nine months of this year, as a stock market rally lifted investment returns and policy sales expanded.】

item.title: 中国誓言大幅提升消费在经济中的比重
item.description: 中国承诺在未来五年内 "大幅 "提高消费在经济中的比重，同时继续将科技和制造业作为重中之重，努力降低经济增长对贸易的依赖程度。【原文：China pledged to “significantly” boost the share of consumption in its economy over the next five years while keeping tech and manufacturing as the top priorities, in an effort to become less reliant on trade to power growth.】

item.title: 德国梅尔茨为何呼吁建立欧洲联合证券交易所
item.description: 德国总理弗里德里希-梅尔茨（Friedrich Merz）呼吁建立一个泛欧证券交易所，作为整个地区股票交易的共同市场。【原文：German Chancellor Friedrich Merz has called for the creation of a pan-European stock exchange to serve as a common marketplace for trading equities across the region.】
